snippet: In a system that will feel familiar to fans who participate in salary-cap fantasy leagues, teams will be working with an assigned bonus pool that they can distribute among their early draft picks.
abstract: In a system that will feel familiar to fans who participate in salary-cap fantasy leagues, teams will be working with an assigned bonus pool that they can distribute among their early draft picks.

headline.main: Top Choices Can No Longer Break the Bank
headline.print_headline: Top Choices Can No Longer Break the Bank
